definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: "Think of cupping as the anti-science version, " wrote Carter.
sentences.chinese: “就把拔罐當成一種反科學的形式吧，”卡特寫道。

sentences.english: Environmentalists were blamed for antiscience in an essay.
sentences.chinese: 環境保護者在一篇文章裏被指責爲反科學者。

sentences.english: Indeed, some observers fear that the antiscience epithet is in danger of becoming meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 的確，一些觀察者擔心反科學這個詞會失去意義。

sentences.english: Antiscience clearly means different things to different people.
sentences.chinese: 反科學對於不同的人來說，意義也不同。

sentences.english: Politicians are not subject to the labeling of antiscience.
sentences.chinese: 政治家不容易被貼上反科學的標籤。

sentences.english: In addition, this independent site links to the anti- Scientology site.
sentences.chinese: 此外，這一獨立的網站也鏈接到反科學教派的網站的。
